import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Obtener información de un chat específico"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/chat/find/{remoteJid}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retorna los detalles de un chat por su JID remoto.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"remoteJid","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"JID del chat/contacto (ej. 51987654321@s.whatsapp.net)","example":"51987654321@s.whatsapp.net"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Detalles del chat solicitado","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"JID del chat"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Nombre mostrado o alias"},"isGroup":{"type":"boolean"},"unreadCount":{"type":"integer"},"isMuted":{"type":"boolean"},"timestamp":{"type":"integer","description":"Timestamp del último mensaje"},"archived":{"type":"boolean"},"pinned":{"type":"boolean"}},"title":"Chat"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
